text: historical aspects of the case can be a clue for investigators to look deeper into the possibility of alien abduction. Donor abductions are only one form of encounter presently experienced by humans. Women who have the abduction experience of missing fetuses or vanishing pregnancies fall into another category. These women are not simply “egg donors” but serve as surrogate mothers for another version of the “white” hybrid. Women who have been selected to carry an embryo or fetus are those who carry some trace of the Silicate Matrix within their latent genetic code.
